item.title: Docker 'no supported platform found in manifest'
item.description: What to do when you’re trying to pull an image that DockerHub hasn’t built yet.

item.title: faas-netes getting 502 'Error pulling metrics from provider/backend'
item.description: How I caused headaches for myself by deploying faas-netes to a different namespace when it only wants to run in the default one.
